\chapter{magic-\/string}
\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e}{}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e}\index{magic-\/string@{magic-\/string}}
\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2145}%
\Hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2145}%
 \href{https://github.com/Rich-Harris/magic-string/actions/workflows/test.yml}{\texttt{  }} \href{https://npmjs.org/package/magic-string}{\texttt{  }} \href{https://github.com/Rich-Harris/magic-string/blob/master/LICENSE.md}{\texttt{  }}

Suppose you have some source code. You want to make some light modifications to it -\/ replacing a few characters here and there, wrapping it with a header and footer, etc -\/ and ideally you\textquotesingle{}d like to generate a \href{https://docs.google.com/document/d/1U1RGAehQwRypUTovF1KRlpiOFze0b-_2gc6fAH0KY0k/}{\texttt{ source map}} at the end of it. You\textquotesingle{}ve thought about using something like \href{https://github.com/benjamn/recast}{\texttt{ recast}} (which allows you to generate an AST from some Java\+Script, manipulate it, and reprint it with a sourcemap without losing your comments and formatting), but it seems like overkill for your needs (or maybe the source code isn\textquotesingle{}t Java\+Script).

Your requirements are, frankly, rather niche. But they\textquotesingle{}re requirements that I also have, and for which I made magic-\/string. It\textquotesingle{}s a small, fast utility for manipulating strings and generating sourcemaps.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2146}{}\doxysection{\texorpdfstring{Installation}{Installation}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2146}
magic-\/string works in both node.\+js and browser environments. For node, install with npm\+:


\begin{DoxyCode}{0}
\DoxyCodeLine{npm\ i\ magic-\/string}

\end{DoxyCode}


To use in browser, grab the \href{https://unpkg.com/magic-string/dist/magic-string.umd.js}{\texttt{ magic-\/string.\+umd.\+js}} file and add it to your page\+:


\begin{DoxyCode}{0}
\DoxyCodeLine{<script\ src="{}magic-\/string.umd.js"{}></script>}

\end{DoxyCode}


(It also works with various module systems, if you prefer that sort of thing -\/ it has a dependency on \href{https://github.com/Rich-Harris/vlq}{\texttt{ vlq}}.)\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2147}{}\doxysection{\texorpdfstring{Usage}{Usage}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2147}
These examples assume you\textquotesingle{}re in node.\+js, or something similar\+:


\begin{DoxyCode}{0}
\DoxyCodeLine{import\ MagicString\ from\ 'magic-\/string';}
\DoxyCodeLine{import\ fs\ from\ 'fs';}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{const\ s\ =\ new\ MagicString('problems\ =\ 99');}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{s.update(0,\ 8,\ 'answer');}
\DoxyCodeLine{s.toString();\ //\ 'answer\ =\ 99'}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{s.update(11,\ 13,\ '42');\ //\ character\ indices\ always\ refer\ to\ the\ original\ string}
\DoxyCodeLine{s.toString();\ //\ 'answer\ =\ 42'}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{s.prepend('var\ ').append(';');\ //\ most\ methods\ are\ chainable}
\DoxyCodeLine{s.toString();\ //\ 'var\ answer\ =\ 42;'}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{const\ map\ =\ s.generateMap(\{}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ source:\ 'source.js',}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ file:\ 'converted.js.map',}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ includeContent:\ true,}
\DoxyCodeLine{\});\ //\ generates\ a\ v3\ sourcemap}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{fs.writeFileSync('converted.js',\ s.toString());}
\DoxyCodeLine{fs.writeFileSync('converted.js.map',\ map.toString());}

\end{DoxyCode}


You can pass an options argument\+:


\begin{DoxyCode}{0}
\DoxyCodeLine{const\ s\ =\ new\ MagicString(someCode,\ \{}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ //\ these\ options\ will\ be\ used\ if\ you\ later\ call\ \`{}bundle.addSource(\ s\ )`\ -\/\ see\ below}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ filename:\ 'foo.js',}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ indentExclusionRanges:\ [}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ /*...*/}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ ],}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ //\ mark\ source\ as\ ignore\ in\ DevTools,\ see\ below\ \#Bundling}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ ignoreList:\ false,}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ //\ adjust\ the\ incoming\ position\ -\/\ see\ below}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ offset:\ 0,}
\DoxyCodeLine{\});}

\end{DoxyCode}
\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2148}{}\doxysection{\texorpdfstring{Properties}{Properties}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2148}
\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2149}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+offset}{s.\+offset}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2149}
Sets the offset property to adjust the incoming position for the following APIs\+: {\ttfamily slice}, {\ttfamily update}, {\ttfamily overwrite}, {\ttfamily append\+Left}, {\ttfamily prepend\+Left}, {\ttfamily append\+Right}, {\ttfamily prepend\+Right}, {\ttfamily move}, {\ttfamily reset}, and {\ttfamily remove}.

Example usage\+:


\begin{DoxyCode}{0}
\DoxyCodeLine{const\ s\ =\ new\ MagicString('hello\ world',\ \{\ offset:\ 0\ \});}
\DoxyCodeLine{s.offset\ =\ 6;}
\DoxyCodeLine{s.slice()\ ===\ 'world';}

\end{DoxyCode}
\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2150}{}\doxysection{\texorpdfstring{Methods}{Methods}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2150}
\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2151}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+add\+Sourcemap\+Location( index )}{s.\+add\+Sourcemap\+Location( index )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2151}
Adds the specified character index (with respect to the original string) to sourcemap mappings, if {\ttfamily hires} is {\ttfamily false} (see below).\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2152}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+append( content )}{s.\+append( content )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2152}
Appends the specified content to the end of the string. Returns {\ttfamily this}.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2153}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+append\+Left( index, content )}{s.\+append\+Left( index, content )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2153}
Appends the specified {\ttfamily content} at the {\ttfamily index} in the original string. If a range {\itshape ending} with {\ttfamily index} is subsequently moved, the insert will be moved with it. Returns {\ttfamily this}. See also {\ttfamily s.\+prepend\+Left(...)}.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2154}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+append\+Right( index, content )}{s.\+append\+Right( index, content )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2154}
Appends the specified {\ttfamily content} at the {\ttfamily index} in the original string. If a range {\itshape starting} with {\ttfamily index} is subsequently moved, the insert will be moved with it. Returns {\ttfamily this}. See also {\ttfamily s.\+prepend\+Right(...)}.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2155}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+clone()}{s.\+clone()}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2155}
Does what you\textquotesingle{}d expect.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2156}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+generate\+Decoded\+Map( options )}{s.\+generate\+Decoded\+Map( options )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2156}
Generates a sourcemap object with raw mappings in array form, rather than encoded as a string. See {\ttfamily generate\+Map} documentation below for options details. Useful if you need to manipulate the sourcemap further, but most of the time you will use {\ttfamily generate\+Map} instead.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2157}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+generate\+Map( options )}{s.\+generate\+Map( options )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2157}
Generates a \href{https://docs.google.com/document/d/1U1RGAehQwRypUTovF1KRlpiOFze0b-_2gc6fAH0KY0k/edit}{\texttt{ version 3 sourcemap}}. All options are, well, optional\+:


\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item {\ttfamily file} -\/ the filename where you plan to write the sourcemap
\item {\ttfamily source} -\/ the filename of the file containing the original source
\item {\ttfamily include\+Content} -\/ whether to include the original content in the map\textquotesingle{}s {\ttfamily sources\+Content} array
\item {\ttfamily hires} -\/ whether the mapping should be high-\/resolution. Hi-\/res mappings map every single character, meaning (for example) your devtools will always be able to pinpoint the exact location of function calls and so on. With lo-\/res mappings, devtools may only be able to identify the correct line -\/ but they\textquotesingle{}re quicker to generate and less bulky. You can also set {\ttfamily "{}boundary"{}} to generate a semi-\/hi-\/res mappings segmented per word boundary instead of per character, suitable for string semantics that are separated by words. If sourcemap locations have been specified with {\ttfamily s.\+add\+Sourcemap\+Location()}, they will be used here.
\end{DoxyItemize}

The returned sourcemap has two (non-\/enumerable) methods attached for convenience\+:


\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item {\ttfamily to\+String} -\/ returns the equivalent of {\ttfamily JSON.\+stringify(map)}
\item {\ttfamily to\+Url} -\/ returns a Data\+URI containing the sourcemap. Useful for doing this sort of thing\+:
\end{DoxyItemize}


\begin{DoxyCode}{0}
\DoxyCodeLine{code\ +=\ '\(\backslash\)n//\#\ sourceMappingURL='\ +\ map.toUrl();}

\end{DoxyCode}
\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2158}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+has\+Changed()}{s.\+has\+Changed()}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2158}
Indicates if the string has been changed.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2159}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+indent( prefix\mbox{[}, options\mbox{]} )}{s.\+indent( prefix\mbox{[}, options\mbox{]} )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2159}
Prefixes each line of the string with {\ttfamily prefix}. If {\ttfamily prefix} is not supplied, the indentation will be guessed from the original content, falling back to a single tab character. Returns {\ttfamily this}.

The {\ttfamily options} argument can have an {\ttfamily exclude} property, which is an array of {\ttfamily \mbox{[}start, end\mbox{]}} character ranges. These ranges will be excluded from the indentation -\/ useful for (e.\+g.) multiline strings.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2160}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+insert\+Left( index, content )}{s.\+insert\+Left( index, content )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2160}
{\bfseries{DEPRECATED}} since 0.\+17 – use {\ttfamily s.\+append\+Left(...)} instead\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2161}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+insert\+Right( index, content )}{s.\+insert\+Right( index, content )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2161}
{\bfseries{DEPRECATED}} since 0.\+17 – use {\ttfamily s.\+prepend\+Right(...)} instead\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2162}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+is\+Empty()}{s.\+is\+Empty()}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2162}
Returns true if the resulting source is empty (disregarding white space).\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2163}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+locate( index )}{s.\+locate( index )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2163}
{\bfseries{DEPRECATED}} since 0.\+10 – see \href{https://github.com/Rich-Harris/magic-string/pull/30}{\texttt{ \#30}}\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2164}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+locate\+Origin( index )}{s.\+locate\+Origin( index )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2164}
{\bfseries{DEPRECATED}} since 0.\+10 – see \href{https://github.com/Rich-Harris/magic-string/pull/30}{\texttt{ \#30}}\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2165}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+move( start, end, index )}{s.\+move( start, end, index )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2165}
Moves the characters from {\ttfamily start} and {\ttfamily end} to {\ttfamily index}. Returns {\ttfamily this}.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2166}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+overwrite( start, end, content\mbox{[}, options\mbox{]} )}{s.\+overwrite( start, end, content\mbox{[}, options\mbox{]} )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2166}
Replaces the characters from {\ttfamily start} to {\ttfamily end} with {\ttfamily content}, along with the appended/prepended content in that range. The same restrictions as {\ttfamily s.\+remove()} apply. Returns {\ttfamily this}.

The fourth argument is optional. It can have a {\ttfamily store\+Name} property — if {\ttfamily true}, the original name will be stored for later inclusion in a sourcemap\textquotesingle{}s {\ttfamily names} array — and a {\ttfamily content\+Only} property which determines whether only the content is overwritten, or anything that was appended/prepended to the range as well.

It may be preferred to use {\ttfamily s.\+update(...)} instead if you wish to avoid overwriting the appended/prepended content.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2167}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+prepend( content )}{s.\+prepend( content )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2167}
Prepends the string with the specified content. Returns {\ttfamily this}.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2168}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+prepend\+Left ( index, content )}{s.\+prepend\+Left ( index, content )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2168}
Same as {\ttfamily s.\+append\+Left(...)}, except that the inserted content will go {\itshape before} any previous appends or prepends at {\ttfamily index}\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2169}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+prepend\+Right ( index, content )}{s.\+prepend\+Right ( index, content )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2169}
Same as {\ttfamily s.\+append\+Right(...)}, except that the inserted content will go {\itshape before} any previous appends or prepends at {\ttfamily index}\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2170}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+replace( regexp\+Or\+String, substitution )}{s.\+replace( regexp\+Or\+String, substitution )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2170}
String replacement with Reg\+Exp or string. When using a Reg\+Exp, replacer function is also supported. Returns {\ttfamily this}.


\begin{DoxyCode}{0}
\DoxyCodeLine{import\ MagicString\ from\ 'magic-\/string';}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{const\ s\ =\ new\ MagicString(source);}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{s.replace('foo',\ 'bar');}
\DoxyCodeLine{s.replace(/foo/g,\ 'bar');}
\DoxyCodeLine{s.replace(/(\(\backslash\)w)(\(\backslash\)d+)/g,\ (\_,\ \$1,\ \$2)\ =>\ \$1.toUpperCase()\ +\ \$2);}

\end{DoxyCode}


The differences from \href{(https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/replace)}{\texttt{ {\ttfamily String.\+replace}}}\+:


\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item It will always match against the {\bfseries{original string}}
\item It mutates the magic string state (use {\ttfamily .clone()} to be immutable)
\end{DoxyItemize}\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2171}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+replace\+All( regexp\+Or\+String, substitution )}{s.\+replace\+All( regexp\+Or\+String, substitution )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2171}
Same as {\ttfamily s.\+replace}, but replace all matched strings instead of just one. If {\ttfamily regexp\+Or\+String} is a regex, then it must have the global ({\ttfamily g}) flag set, or a {\ttfamily Type\+Error} is thrown. Matches the behavior of the builtin \href{https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/replaceAll}{\texttt{ {\ttfamily String.\+property.\+replace\+All}}}. Returns {\ttfamily this}.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2172}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+remove( start, end )}{s.\+remove( start, end )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2172}
Removes the characters from {\ttfamily start} to {\ttfamily end} (of the original string, {\bfseries{not}} the generated string). Removing the same content twice, or making removals that partially overlap, will cause an error. Returns {\ttfamily this}.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2173}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+reset( start, end )}{s.\+reset( start, end )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2173}
Resets the characters from {\ttfamily start} to {\ttfamily end} (of the original string, {\bfseries{not}} the generated string). It can be used to restore previously removed characters and discard unwanted changes.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2174}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+slice( start, end )}{s.\+slice( start, end )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2174}
Returns the content of the generated string that corresponds to the slice between {\ttfamily start} and {\ttfamily end} of the original string. Throws error if the indices are for characters that were already removed.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2175}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+snip( start, end )}{s.\+snip( start, end )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2175}
Returns a clone of {\ttfamily s}, with all content before the {\ttfamily start} and {\ttfamily end} characters of the original string removed.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2176}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+to\+String()}{s.\+to\+String()}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2176}
Returns the generated string.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2177}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+trim(\mbox{[} char\+Type \mbox{]})}{s.\+trim(\mbox{[} char\+Type \mbox{]})}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2177}
Trims content matching {\ttfamily char\+Type} (defaults to {\ttfamily \textbackslash{}s}, i.\+e. whitespace) from the start and end. Returns {\ttfamily this}.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2178}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+trim\+Start(\mbox{[} char\+Type \mbox{]})}{s.\+trim\+Start(\mbox{[} char\+Type \mbox{]})}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2178}
Trims content matching {\ttfamily char\+Type} (defaults to {\ttfamily \textbackslash{}s}, i.\+e. whitespace) from the start. Returns {\ttfamily this}.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2179}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+trim\+End(\mbox{[} char\+Type \mbox{]})}{s.\+trim\+End(\mbox{[} char\+Type \mbox{]})}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2179}
Trims content matching {\ttfamily char\+Type} (defaults to {\ttfamily \textbackslash{}s}, i.\+e. whitespace) from the end. Returns {\ttfamily this}.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2180}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+trim\+Lines()}{s.\+trim\+Lines()}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2180}
Removes empty lines from the start and end. Returns {\ttfamily this}.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2181}{}\doxysubsection{\texorpdfstring{s.\+update( start, end, content\mbox{[}, options\mbox{]} )}{s.\+update( start, end, content\mbox{[}, options\mbox{]} )}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2181}
Replaces the characters from {\ttfamily start} to {\ttfamily end} with {\ttfamily content}. The same restrictions as {\ttfamily s.\+remove()} apply. Returns {\ttfamily this}.

The fourth argument is optional. It can have a {\ttfamily store\+Name} property — if {\ttfamily true}, the original name will be stored for later inclusion in a sourcemap\textquotesingle{}s {\ttfamily names} array — and an {\ttfamily overwrite} property which defaults to {\ttfamily false} and determines whether anything that was appended/prepended to the range will be overwritten along with the original content.

{\ttfamily s.\+update(start, end, content)} is equivalent to {\ttfamily s.\+overwrite(start, end, content, \{ content\+Only\+: true \})}.\hypertarget{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2182}{}\doxysection{\texorpdfstring{Bundling}{Bundling}}\label{md__project5___h_r_2_project5___h_r___front___end_2node__modules_2magic-string_2_r_e_a_d_m_e_autotoc_md2182}
To concatenate several sources, use {\ttfamily Magic\+String.\+Bundle}\+:


\begin{DoxyCode}{0}
\DoxyCodeLine{const\ bundle\ =\ new\ MagicString.Bundle();}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{bundle.addSource(\{}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ filename:\ 'foo.js',}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ content:\ new\ MagicString('var\ answer\ =\ 42;'),}
\DoxyCodeLine{\});}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{bundle.addSource(\{}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ filename:\ 'bar.js',}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ content:\ new\ MagicString('console.log(\ answer\ )'),}
\DoxyCodeLine{\});}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{//\ Sources\ can\ be\ marked\ as\ ignore-\/listed,\ which\ provides\ a\ hint\ to\ debuggers}
\DoxyCodeLine{//\ to\ not\ step\ into\ this\ code\ and\ also\ don't\ show\ the\ source\ files\ depending}
\DoxyCodeLine{//\ on\ user\ preferences.}
\DoxyCodeLine{bundle.addSource(\{}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ filename:\ 'some-\/3rdparty-\/library.js',}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ content:\ new\ MagicString('function\ myLib()\{\}'),}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ ignoreList:\ false,\ //\ <-\/-\/}
\DoxyCodeLine{\});}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{//\ Advanced:\ a\ source\ can\ include\ an\ \`{}indentExclusionRanges`\ property}
\DoxyCodeLine{//\ alongside\ \`{}filename`\ and\ \`{}content`.\ This\ will\ be\ passed\ to\ \`{}s.indent()`}
\DoxyCodeLine{//\ -\/\ see\ documentation\ above}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{bundle}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ .indent()\ //\ optionally,\ pass\ an\ indent\ string,\ otherwise\ it\ will\ be\ guessed}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ .prepend('(function\ ()\ \{\(\backslash\)n')}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ .append('\}());');}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{bundle.toString();}
\DoxyCodeLine{//\ (function\ ()\ \{}
\DoxyCodeLine{//\ \ \ var\ answer\ =\ 42;}
\DoxyCodeLine{//\ \ \ console.log(\ answer\ );}
\DoxyCodeLine{//\ \}());}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{//\ options\ are\ as\ per\ \`{}s.generateMap()`\ above}
\DoxyCodeLine{const\ map\ =\ bundle.generateMap(\{}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ file:\ 'bundle.js',}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ includeContent:\ true,}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ hires:\ true,}
\DoxyCodeLine{\});}

\end{DoxyCode}


As an alternative syntax, if you a) don\textquotesingle{}t have {\ttfamily filename} or {\ttfamily indent\+Exclusion\+Ranges} options, or b) passed those in when you used {\ttfamily new Magic\+String(...)}, you can simply pass the {\ttfamily Magic\+String} instance itself\+:


\begin{DoxyCode}{0}
\DoxyCodeLine{const\ bundle\ =\ new\ MagicString.Bundle();}
\DoxyCodeLine{const\ source\ =\ new\ MagicString(someCode,\ \{}
\DoxyCodeLine{\ \ \ \ filename:\ 'foo.js',}
\DoxyCodeLine{\});}
\DoxyCodeLine{}
\DoxyCodeLine{bundle.addSource(source);}

\end{DoxyCode}
